title: Elegant Diamond and Emerald Kasulaperu Haaram with South Sea Pearls
materials: South Sea Pearls. Features Hyderabadi Polish for enhanced luster.
features: Classic Kasulaperu design with intricately crafted diamond-studded motifs. colors: Predominantly gold and white (diamonds) with a vibrant green accent from the emerald and creamy white pearls.
occasions: or any special occasion where you want to make a statement. Also suitable for upscale modern events.
description: This stunning Kasulaperu is a perfect blend of traditional South Indian aesthetics and modern jewelry design. The high-quality diamonds and lustrous South Sea pearls add a touch of luxury, while the intricate craftsmanship ensures lasting beauty and durability. The Hyderabadi polish guarantees a brilliant shine that will capture attention. The inclusion of a natural emerald, considered an auspicious gem, makes it a truly special piece.
